content: - 16 -   References    Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System (2017).  Monetary Policy Report.    Washington:  Board of Governors,  February, https://www.federalreserve.gov/monetarypolicy/files/20170214_mprfull report.pdf.     D’Amico, Stefania, William English, David Lopez-Salido, and Edward Nelson (2012).    “The Federal Reserve’s Large-Scale Asset Purchase Programmes:  Rationale and  Effects,” Economic Journal, vol. 122 (November), pp. F415-46.     Engen, Eric M., Thomas Laubach, and David Reifschneider (2015).  “The   Macroeconomic Effects of the Federal Reserve’s Unconventional Monetary  Policies,” Finance and Economics Discussion Series 2015-005.  Washington:   Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System,  February, http://dx.doi.org/10.17016/FEDS.2015.005.      Holston, Kathryn, Thomas Laubach, and John C. Williams (2016).  “Measuring the   Natural Rate of Interest:  International Trends and Determinants,” Finance and  Economics Discussion Series 2016-073.  Washington:  Board of Governors of the  Federal Reserve System, September, http://dx.doi.org/10.17016/FEDS.2016.073.     Yellen, Janet (2016).  “The Federal Reserve’s Monetary Policy Toolkit:  Past, Present,   and Future,” speech delivered at “Designing Resilient Monetary Policy  Frameworks for the Future,” a symposium sponsored by the Federal Reserve  Bank of Kansas City, held in Jackson Hole, Wyo., August  26, https://www.federalreserve.gov/newsevents/speech/yellen20160826a.htm.      -------- (2017).  “The Economic Outlook and the Conduct of Monetary Policy,” speech   delivered at the Stanford Institute for Economic Policy Research, Stanford  University, Stanford, Calif., January  19, https://www.federalreserve.gov/newsevents/speech/yellen20170119a.htm.
